roleset.name: reflect light moistly
roleset.note: GLISTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glisten' based on sentences in brown. Verbnet entry (from glisten.01-v predicate notes)
GLISTENING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from glistening.01-j)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: ..studded with water tanks of turquoise tile in which were reflected the glistening blue curves of a hundred domes.

example.name: verbal
example.text: The fountain had brimmed over, the cannon were wet, the soldiers' monument glistened.
